class.name: ontology.classes.PlannedWork
class.description: Represents the idea of a human construction to come. Contains all the specifics required for construction.

method.name: isBuilt
method.description: Returns true if this element is entierly built.

method.name: canBeCreated
method.description:
Returns 'True' if agent has the physical capability to create and build this element.
This implementation returns true if agent has the physical capability and has the resource capacities to build this element.

method.name: createIt
method.description: To create and build this element.

method.name: canBeDeconstructed
method.description: Returns 'True' if agent has the physical capability to deconstruct this element.

method.name: deconstructIt
method.description: To deconstruct (and then remove) this element. Returns 'true' when element is deconstructed.

method.name: removeIt
method.description: To remove instantaneously an existing work without any physical capability considerations.
